entry.title: Latex数学公式
entry.content:
希腊字母

$$
\delta,\lambda\
\Delta,\Lambda\
\Alpha,\Beta\
\phi,\varphi\
\epsilon,\varepsilon\
π
$$

Option + P = π

上下标

$$
a^2,a_1\
x^{y+z},p_{ij},p_ij\
x_i,x_{ m i}\
ext{A B}, m{A B}\
ext A B, m A B\
{ m A} B\
$$

分式与根式

$$
rac{1}{2}, rac 1 2,\
rac 1 {x+y}\
rac{\dfrac 1 x +1}{y+1}
$$

$$
\sqrt 2,\sqrt{x+y},\sqrt[3]{x+y}
$$

普通运算符

$$
+-\
imes,\cdot,\div\
\pm,\mp\
<>,\ge,\le,\gg,\ll, e,\approx,\equiv\
\cap,\cup,\in, otin,\subset,\subseteq,\subsetneq,\subsetneqq,\varnothing\
orall,\exists, exists\
ecause, herefore\
\mathbb R,\R,\Q,\N,\Z_+\
\mathcal F,\mathscr F\
$$

$$
\cdots,\vdots,\ddots
$$

$$
\infty,\partial,∂, abla,\propto,\degree
$$

option+D = ∂
$$
\sin x,\sec x,\cosh x\
\log_2 x, \ln x, \lg x\
\lim{x o 0} rac x {\sin x}\
\lim\limits_{x o 0} rac x {\sin x}\
\max x
$$

$$
MSE(x)\
ext {MSE}(x)
$$

大型运算符

$$
\sum,\prod\
\sum_i,\sum_{i=0}^N\
rac{\sum\limits_{i=1}^n x_i}{\prod\limits_{i=1}^n x_i}
$$

$$
\int,\iint,\iiint,\oint,\oiint\
\int_{-\infty}^0 f(x), ext dx
$$

$$
a,a\
a\ a\
a\quad a\
a\qquad a\
$$

标注符号

$$
\vec x, \overrightarrow {AB}\
ar x, \overline{AB}\
$$

箭头

$$
\leftarrow, ightarrow,\Rightarrow,\leftrightarrow,\longleftarrow
$$

括号与定界符

$$
()[] { } \
\lceil, ceil,\lfloor, floor,||\
\left(0, rac 1 a ight]\
\left. rac {∂f}{∂x} ight|_{x=0}
$$

多行公式

$$
egin{align}

a&=b+c+d\
&=e+f

\end{align}
$$

大括号

$$
f(x)=

egin{cases}

\sin x, &-π\le x \le π\
0,& ext {其他}

\end{cases}
$$

矩阵

$$
egin{matrix}

a & b & \cdots & c \
\vdots& \vdots & \ddots & \vdots \
e & f & \cdots & g

\end{matrix}
$$

$$
egin{bmatrix}

a & b & \cdots & c \
\vdots& \vdots & \ddots & \vdots \
e & f & \cdots & g

\end{bmatrix}
$$

$$
egin{pmatrix}

a & b & \cdots & c \
\vdots& \vdots & \ddots & \vdots \
e & f & \cdots & g

\end{pmatrix}
$$

$$
egin{vmatrix}

a & b & \cdots & c \
\vdots& \vdots & \ddots & \vdots \
e & f & \cdots & g

\end{vmatrix}
$$

$$
f A, f B^{ m T}
$$

实战演练

$$
f(x) = rac 1 {\sqrt{2π} \sigma} { m e}^{- rac{(x-\mu)^2} {2\sigma^2}} \
f(x) = rac 1 {\sqrt{2π} \sigma} \exp \left[{- rac{(x-\mu)^2} {2\sigma^2}} ight]
$$

$$
\lim \limits _{N o \infty} P \left{ \left| rac{I \left( \alpha_i ight)}{N} - H(s) ight| < \varepsilon ight} =1
$$

$$
x(n) = rac 1 {2π} \int_{-π} ^π X\left( m e ^{ m j \omega } ight) m e ^{ m j \omega n} , { m d} \omega
$$

$$
egin{align}

\vec B \left( \vec r ight) &= rac {\mu_0} {4π} \oint_C rac {I , { m d} \vec l imes \vec R}{R^3}\
&= rac {\mu_0} {4π} \int_V rac{\vec J_V imes \vec R}{R^3},{ m d} V’

\end{align}
$$

entry.title: 表头文件
hello-world
entry.content:
Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub.
